product_name: Von Zipper Lesmore Polarized Sunlgasses - Men's
long_description: Made in Italy, the men's Lesmore Polarized Sunlgasses from VonZipper dish up serious retro styling as well as serious eye protection for all the time you spend in the sun. Polarized Lesmore lenses cut glare from water, sand, snow and asphalt, block 100% of harmful UV rays, and block 90% of visible light. Polycarbonate lenses are highly impact resistant. Grilamid(R) lightweight nylon frames remain flexible at any temperature and are extremely impact resistant. Stainless-steel optical hinges add durability. VonZipper Lesmore Polarized Sunglasses feature base 6 spherical lenses in a square shape.
short_description: Made in Italy, the men's Lesmore Polarized Sunlgasses from VonZipper dish up serious retro styling as well as serious eye protection for all the time you spend in the sun.
